mapper.insert: insert into T_StatusData (StatusTypeId, CurStatus, NextStatus, Start, Stop, Hold, Count, EventType, EventName, OpId, DevId, TaskId, MdlId) VALUES (#{statusTypeId}, #{curStatus}, #{nextStatus}, #{start}, #{stop}, #{hold}, #{count}, #{eventType}, #{eventName}, #{opId}, #{devId}, #{taskId}, #{mldId})
